input_args.passage: 'Church of St. Mary of the Spring (Istanbul) | The church is located in Istanbul, in the district of Zeytinburnu, in the neighbourhood of Balıklı, along Balıklı Sivrikapı Sokak. It lies a few hundred meters ...'
input_args.claim: "The second citation further clarifies that the local name of the church is Balıklı Meryem Ana Rum Ortodoks monasteries, also known as Monestry of Our Lady of Spring, and it is located in Istanbul's Zeytinburnu."
